description:
Yuu tries to recreate the ramen of her childhood.
She can`t even remember the name of the place, and with only the fact that it`s "Delicious Ramen", she is a complete loss.
However, after Koizumi-san samples her ramen, they figure out the original source.
What exactly is the mysterious "Delicious Ramen"?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おいしいラーメン / 大阪
